definitions: To pierce or stab with a sword or similar weapon.
To decorate with a perforated pattern.
To cut a scalloped or zigzag edge on cloth with pinking shears.
To make a knocking or pinging sound, especially of an internal combustion engine.
examples: The tailor pinks the fabric's edge.
The old engine pinks when it goes uphill.
He pinks the design onto the leather.
